summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Gesti√≥n JM - Gastos Compartidos app completed successfully. Tested login flows, navigation, expense management, settings, and PWA functionality.
passed_tests: Login flow - Mariano with correct PIN (1234)
Login error handling - incorrect PIN shows 'PIN incorrecto' message
PIN input auto-focus and auto-submission after 4th digit
Main app navigation with bottom tabs (Inicio, Gastos, Ajustes, Alertas)
Home tab - monthly balance display, month selector, 'Mes cerrado' card for zero balance
Expense creation - form opens, all fields work, category selection, submission successful
Expense listing - created expenses appear in list grouped by month
Settings tab - three sections (Transferencias, Cambiar PIN, Cuenta)
PIN change validation - correctly shows error for mismatched PINs
Transfers section - shows 'Registrar transferencia' button for authorized users
Account section - displays user info and permissions correctly
Logout functionality - successfully returns to login screen
Month navigation - previous/next month buttons work on home tab
Empty states - proper messages for no expenses and no transfers
User permissions - Mariano has admin rights (edit all, manage transfers)
